titleStmt.title: Solitarinesse improved, in occasionall meditations upon several subjects. By D.L.
Objectorum reductio, or, Daily imployment for the soule
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Donald, d. 1676.

notesStmt.note: Another issue, with cancel t.p. and prelims., of the author's "Objectorum reductio, or, Daily imployment for the soule. London, 1634." -- Cf. STC (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: faded, with considerable loss of text.
This item appears at reel 559:2 as STC 16945a.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
